Interface DialogConfig

Data structure for definig properties of a Dialog component.

Hierarchy

  • DialogConfig

Indexable

[propName: string]: any

Additional arbitrary properties (mostly for internal/extended component use)

Index

Properties

Optional appendInline

appendInline: boolean
  • Defined in src/dialog/dialog-config.interface.ts:81

Set to true to open the dialog next to the triggering component

Optional closeTrigger

closeTrigger: "mouseout" | "mouseleave"
  • Defined in src/dialog/dialog-config.interface.ts:54

Parameter for triggering the Dialog close event.

Optional closeWhenHidden

closeWhenHidden: boolean
  • Defined in src/dialog/dialog-config.interface.ts:64

If true the dialog will close when hidden (by scrolling or otherwise going out of the viewport) If false the dialog will stay open until explicitly closed When true this closure method can be picked up via CloseReasons.hidden

content

content: string | TemplateRef<any>
  • Defined in src/dialog/dialog-config.interface.ts:46

Body content for the Dialog.

Optional data

data: Object
  • Defined in src/dialog/dialog-config.interface.ts:85

Config object passed to the rendered component. (Optional)

Optional disabled

disabled: boolean
  • Defined in src/dialog/dialog-config.interface.ts:101

This prevents the dialog from being toggled

Optional gap

gap: number
  • Defined in src/dialog/dialog-config.interface.ts:73

Used to set the offset of the Dialog relative to the content it is associated to.

Optional offset

offset: object
  • Defined in src/dialog/dialog-config.interface.ts:97

This specifies any vertical and horizontal offset for the position of the dialog

Type declaration

  • x: number
  • y: number

Optional parentRef

parentRef: ElementRef
  • Defined in src/dialog/dialog-config.interface.ts:77

Reference to the Parent element that links the Dialog.

Optional placement

placement: string
  • Defined in src/dialog/dialog-config.interface.ts:68

Parameter defining the placement in which the Dialog appears.

Optional shouldClose

shouldClose: function
  • Defined in src/dialog/dialog-config.interface.ts:58

Callback to control the closing behaviour. return true to close, and false to prevent closing

Type declaration

    • (meta?: CloseMeta): boolean

    • Parameters

      • Optional meta: CloseMeta

      Returns boolean

Optional title

title: string
  • Defined in src/dialog/dialog-config.interface.ts:42

Title for the Dialog header.

Optional trigger

trigger: "click" | "hover" | "mouseenter"
  • Defined in src/dialog/dialog-config.interface.ts:50

Parameter for triggering Dialog display.

Optional wrapperClass

wrapperClass: string
  • Defined in src/dialog/dialog-config.interface.ts:93

Classes to add to the dialog container
